readable.title: 1801874841_4c12055e2f
readable.content: A brown dog is staring closely at a sleeping brown and white dog . A little dog struggles with a man holding a slipper . A small brown dog is playing with a fuzzy slipper . The black and tan dog is on a rug , tugging on a slipper . The little dog grabs a hold of the bedroom slipper with its mouth .
